text: You designed a new discharge circuit for your inverter. Your maximum DC Link Voltage is 500V and you have a DC Link capacity of 400 pF. Your circuit discharges with a constant current of 50 mA and has a maximum operating Temperature of 125Â°C. The used cooling plate has a Thermal capacity of 3 J/K and a thermal resistance to the surrounding air of 0.2 W/K. Other thermal interfaces can be regarded as ideal. Is your circuit rules compliant?
